job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: ltpgtare you excited about developing full stack web applications that customers love to use we certainly are and thats why were looking for likeminded engineers to join veritone to help us achieve that missionltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtwe are a small software team that develops software for the media and entertainment sector supporting a variety of use cases from discovering relevant media snippets out of a pool of radio or video content attribute customer engagement to advertisement campaigns or help agencies produce and place product ads ltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtcurrently were looking for software engineers that can quickly understand business use cases make good technology choices and deliver operationally robust software that stands the test of time were a small team of engineers that work closely together using agile software development methodologies we use predominantly react and nodejsltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtif you have years full stack experience understand javascript frameworks and backend services reach out to me on linkedinltpgt
